createBudgetDescription: Give your budget a name and choose the mode that suits your purpose.
trackingModeDescription: Ideal for tracking income and expenses in personal or shared budgets.
sharingModeDescription: Used to fairly split common expenses with friends and track debts.
noBudgets: You haven't created a budget yet.
clickNewBudget: Click the 'New Budget' button to get started.
deleteBudgetWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the "{budgetName}" budget and all transactions within it.
noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
updateProfileDescription: Update your name and profile picture.
budgetNotFoundDescription: This budget may not exist or may have been deleted.
noDebts: Nobody owes anyone anything yet. All square.
atLeastTwoMembers: There must be at least 2 members to calculate debts.
deleteTransactionWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the transaction.
noMatchingTransactions: No transactions found matching your search.
contributionDescription: Each member's contribution to income and expenses.
whoPaidDescription: The total amount paid by each member.
noDataForPeriod: No data found for this period.
noSpendingData: No spending data for this period.
notEnoughData: Not enough data to show a trend.
aiInsightsDescription: Get a summary of your spending habits and key insights powered by AI.
failedToGenerate: Failed to generate insights. Please try again.
inviteCodeDescription: Share this code to invite others to this budget.
removeMemberWarning: You will permanently remove this user from the budget.
emailInUse: This email address is already registered.
signupSuccess: Your account has been created. Please log in.
updateSuccess: Your profile has been updated successfully.
joinRequestSuccess: Your join request has been sent.
error_mustSelectParticipant: Please select at least one participant.
error_mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to add a transaction.
setCurrencyForBudget: Set the currency for this budget. All financial data will be displayed in this currency.
